summary:
Adds portable alchemy and enchanting tables to all vendors who sell scrolls.
Drop the items and activate them while sneaking to construct them. Activate them again while sneaking to deconstruct them.
descriptionHtml:
Adds portable alchemy and enchanting tables to all vendors who sell scrolls.
Drop the items and activate them while sneaking to construct them. Activate them again while sneaking to deconstruct them.

I\'m not completely sure why the merchants have three of them, but ah well.

The rotation of the packed item doesn\'t matter, it can be fallen over and the table should be placed correctly.

Please let me know of any bugs you find, but only if you can re-create them.
If you have any questions, leave a comment or send me a message.

If you enjoy it, please endorse so other people can find it easier.
author: Elec0
